00027 struct MinionInstancePrinter
00028 {
00029   ostringstream oss;
00030   CSPInstance& csp;
00031   
00032   MinionInstancePrinter(CSPInstance& _csp) : csp(_csp)
00033     { }
00034     
00035   string getInstance()
00036   { return oss.str(); }
00037   
00038   void print_instance(const int& i)
00039   { oss << i; }
00040   
00041   void print_instance(const string& s)
00042   { oss << s; }
00043 
00044   void print_instance(const Var& var)
00045   { 
00046     if(var.type() == VAR_CONSTANT)
00047       print_instance( var.pos());
00048     else if(var.type() == VAR_NOTBOOL)
00049     {
00050       oss << "!";
00051       oss << csp.vars.getName(Var(VAR_BOOL, var.pos())); 
00052     }
00053     else
00054       oss << csp.vars.getName(var); 
00055   }
00056 
00057 template<typename T>
00058 void print_instance( const vector<T>& vars, char start = '[', char end = ']')
00059 {
00060   oss << start;
00061   if(!vars.empty())
00062   {
00063     print_instance( vars[0]);
00064     for(int i = 1; i < vars.size(); ++i)
00065     {
00066       oss << ",";
00067       print_instance( vars[i]);
00068     }
00069   }
00070   oss << end;
00071 }
00072 
00073 void print_instance(const ConstraintBlob& blob)
00074 {  
00075   oss << blob.constraint->name;
00076   oss << "(";
00077   
00078   int var_pos = 0;
00079   int const_pos = 0;
00080   int constraint_child_pos = 0;
00081   
00082   for(int i = 0; i < blob.constraint->number_of_params; i++)
00083   {
00084     if(i != 0)
00085       oss << ", ";
00086       
00087     switch(blob.constraint->read_types[i])
00088     {
00089       case read_list:
00090         print_instance( blob.vars[var_pos++]);
00091         break;
00092       case read_var:
00093       case read_bool_var:
00094         print_instance( blob.vars[var_pos++][0]);
00095         break;
00096       case read_2_vars:
00097       {
00098         print_instance( blob.vars[var_pos][0]);
00099         oss << ",";
00100         print_instance( blob.vars[var_pos++][1]);
00101       }
00102         break;
00103       case read_constant:
00104         print_instance( blob.constants[const_pos++][0]);
00105         break;
00106       case read_constant_list:
00107         print_instance( blob.constants[const_pos++]);
00108         break;  
00109       case read_tuples:
00110         oss << csp.getTableName(blob.tuples);
00111       break;
00112       case read_constraint:
00113         print_instance(blob.internal_constraints[constraint_child_pos]);
00114         constraint_child_pos++;
00115       break;
00116       case read_constraint_list:
00117         oss << "{";
00118         print_instance(blob.internal_constraints[0]);
00119         for(int j = 1; j < blob.internal_constraints.size(); ++j)
00120         {
00121           oss << ", ";
00122           print_instance(blob.internal_constraints[j]); 
00123         }
00124         oss << "}";
00125         break;
00126       default:
00127       oss << "???";
00128 //          D_FATAL_ERROR("Internal Error!");
00129     }
00130   }
00131   
00132   oss << ")";
00133   oss << endl;  
00134 }
00135   
00136 void print_instance(const VarContainer& vars, const vector<Var>& varlist)
00137 { 
00138   for(int i = 0; i < varlist.size(); ++i)
00139   {
00140     switch(varlist[i].type())
00141     {
00142       case VAR_BOOL:
00143       oss << "BOOL ";
00144       print_instance(varlist[i]);
00145       oss << endl;
00146       break;
00147 
00148       case VAR_BOUND:
00149       {
00150         oss << "BOUND ";
00151         print_instance(varlist[i]);
00152         pair<BoundType, vector<DomainInt> > bound = vars.get_domain(varlist[i]);
00153         D_ASSERT(bound.first == Bound_Yes);
00154         D_ASSERT(bound.second.size() == 2);
00155         oss << "{" << bound.second[0] << ".." << bound.second[1] << "}" << endl;
00156       }
00157       break;
00158 
00159       case VAR_SPARSEBOUND:
00160       {
00161         oss << "SPARSEBOUND ";
00162         print_instance(varlist[i]);
00163         pair<BoundType, vector<DomainInt> > bound = vars.get_domain(varlist[i]);
00164         D_ASSERT(bound.first == Bound_No);
00165         print_instance( bound.second, '{', '}');
00166         oss << endl;
00167       }
00168       break;
00169 
00170       case VAR_DISCRETE:
00171       {
00172         oss << "DISCRETE ";
00173         print_instance(varlist[i]);
00174         pair<BoundType, vector<DomainInt> > bound = vars.get_domain(varlist[i]);
00175         D_ASSERT(bound.first == Bound_Yes);
00176         D_ASSERT(bound.second.size() == 2);
00177         oss << "{" << bound.second[0] << ".." << bound.second[1] << "}" << endl;
00178       }
00179       break;
00180       
00181       default:
00182       abort();
00183     }
00184   }
00185   
00186   return;
00187   
00188   for(int i = 0; i < vars.BOOLs; ++i)
00189   {  
00190     oss << "BOOL ";
00191     print_instance( Var(VAR_BOOL, i));
00192     oss << endl;
00193   }
00194     
00195   // Bounds.
00196   int bound_sum = 0;
00197   for(int x = 0; x < vars.bound.size(); ++x)
00198   {
00199     for(int i = 0; i < vars.bound[x].first; ++i)
00200     {
00201       oss << "BOUND ";
00202       print_instance( Var(VAR_BOUND, i + bound_sum));
00203       oss << "{" << vars.bound[x].second.lower_bound << ".." << vars.bound[x].second.upper_bound << "}" << endl;
00204     }
00205     bound_sum += vars.bound[x].first;
00206   }
00207   
00208   // Sparse Bounds.
00209   
00210   int sparse_bound_sum = 0;
00211   for(int x = 0; x < vars.sparse_bound.size(); ++x)
00212   {
00213     for(int i = 0; i < vars.sparse_bound[x].first; ++i)
00214     {
00215       oss << "SPARSEBOUND "; 
00216       print_instance( Var(VAR_BOUND, i + sparse_bound_sum));
00217       oss << " ";
00218       print_instance( vars.sparse_bound[x].second, '{', '}');
00219       oss << endl;
00220     }
00221     sparse_bound_sum += vars.sparse_bound[x].first;
00222   }
00223   
00224   // Bounds.
00225   int discrete_sum = 0;
00226   for(int x = 0; x < vars.discrete.size(); ++x)
00227   {
00228     for(int i = 0; i < vars.discrete[x].first; ++i)
00229     {
00230       oss << "DISCRETE ";
00231       print_instance( Var(VAR_DISCRETE, i + discrete_sum));
00232       oss << "{" << vars.discrete[x].second.lower_bound << ".." << vars.discrete[x].second.upper_bound << "}" << endl;
00233     }
00234     discrete_sum += vars.discrete[x].first;
00235   }
00236   
00237 }
00238 
00239 void print_tuples( )
00240 {
00241   typedef map<string, TupleList*>::const_iterator it_type;
00242   
00243   for(it_type it = csp.table_symboltable.begin(); it != csp.table_symboltable.end(); ++it)
00244   {
00245     oss << it->first << " ";
00246     int tuple_size = it->second->tuple_size();
00247     int num_tuples = it->second->size();
00248     int* tuple_ptr = it->second->getPointer();
00249     oss << num_tuples << " " << tuple_size << endl;
00250     for(int i = 0; i < num_tuples; ++i)
00251     {
00252       for(int j = 0; j < tuple_size; ++j)
00253         oss << *(tuple_ptr + (i * tuple_size) + j) << " ";
00254       oss << endl;
00255     }
00256     oss << endl;
00257   }
00258 }
00259 
00260 void print_search_info(const vector<Var>& var_vec )
00261 {
00262   set<Var> vars(var_vec.begin(), var_vec.end());
00263   
00264   if(csp.is_optimisation_problem && vars.count(csp.optimise_variable))
00265   {
00266     if(csp.optimise_minimising)
00267       oss << "MINIMISING ";
00268     else
00269       oss << "MAXIMISING ";
00270     print_instance( csp.optimise_variable);
00271     oss << endl; 
00272   } 
00273   
00274   for(int i = 0; i < csp.search_order.size(); ++i)
00275   {
00276     // Filter the var and val orders.
00277     
00278     vector<Var> var_order = csp.search_order[i].var_order;
00279     vector<char> val_order = csp.search_order[i].val_order;
00280     
00281     int pos = 0;
00282     while(pos < var_order.size())
00283     {
00284       if(vars.count(var_order[pos]) == 0)
00285       {
00286         var_order.erase(var_order.begin() + pos);
00287         val_order.erase(val_order.begin() + pos);
00288       }
00289       else
00290         pos++;
00291     }
00292     
00293     if(!var_order.empty())
00294     {
00295       oss << "VARORDER ";
00296       print_instance(var_order);
00297       oss << endl;
00298     }
00299   
00300     if(!val_order.empty())
00301     {
00302       oss << "VALORDER ";
00303       vector<string> output_vars;
00304       for(int j = 0; j < val_order.size(); ++j)
00305         output_vars.push_back(val_order[j] ? "a" : "d");
00306       print_instance( output_vars);
00307       oss << endl;
00308     }
00309   }
00310   if(!csp.permutation.empty())
00311   {
00312     oss << "PERMUTATION ";
00313     print_instance( csp.permutation);
00314     oss << endl;
00315   }
00316   
00317   if(csp.print_matrix.empty())
00318   {
00319     oss << "PRINT NONE" << endl;
00320   }
00321   else
00322   {
00323     vector<vector<Var> > new_print_matrix;
00324     for(int i = 0; i < csp.print_matrix.size(); ++i)
00325     {
00326       new_print_matrix.push_back(vector<Var>());
00327       for(int j = 0; j < csp.print_matrix[i].size(); ++j)
00328       {
00329         if(vars.count(csp.print_matrix[i][j]))
00330           new_print_matrix[i].push_back(csp.print_matrix[i][j]);
00331       }
00332     }
00333     
00334     oss << "PRINT";
00335     print_instance(new_print_matrix);
00336     oss << endl;
00337   }
00338   
00339 }
00340 
00341 void build_instance()
00342 { build_instance(csp.constraints, csp.vars.get_all_vars()); }
00343 
00344 
00345 void build_instance(const vector<Var>& varlist_vec)
00346 {
00347   list<ConstraintBlob> new_constraint_list;
00348   
00349   set<Var> varlist(varlist_vec.begin(), varlist_vec.end());
00350   
00351   //set<Var> list_of_vars
00352   for(list<ConstraintBlob>::iterator it = csp.constraints.begin(); it != csp.constraints.end(); ++it)
00353   {
00354     set<Var> vars = it->get_all_vars();
00355     if(includes(varlist.begin(), varlist.end(), vars.begin(), vars.end()))
00356       new_constraint_list.push_back(*it);
00357   }
00358   
00359   build_instance( new_constraint_list, varlist_vec);
00360 }
00361 
00362 void build_instance(const list<ConstraintBlob>& constraints, 
00363                           const vector<Var>& varlist)
00364 {
00365   oss << "MINION 3" << endl;
00366   
00367   csp.add_variable_names();
00368     
00369   oss << "**VARIABLES**" << endl;
00370   print_instance(csp.vars, varlist);
00371   
00372   oss << "**SEARCH**" << endl;
00373   print_search_info(varlist);
00374   
00375   oss << "**TUPLELIST**" << endl;
00376   print_tuples();
00377   
00378   oss << "**CONSTRAINTS**" << endl;
00379   for(list<ConstraintBlob>::const_iterator it = constraints.begin(); 
00380       it != constraints.end(); ++it)
00381   {
00382     print_instance( *it);
00383   }
00384   oss << "**EOF**" << endl;
00385 }
